_description: ‘Prophetia Regis Anglie’, the Prophecy of Merlyon of the conquest of France — 26 couplets

BLHar2338.First Lines: Whanne M & ccccc togedre be knetand xxx & vi with hem are met…
BLHar2338.Last Lines: …This manys sone all n[   ]Aboute all þe werd in [   ]y…
BLHar2338.Note: Eighteen lines only, ends incomplete; incorporates 5375 as second half.
